StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateTemplate]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @TemplateID uniqueiden..er, @OrgID int, @Type varchar(30), @Name varchar(100), @UploadDate date.me, @UploadedBy varchar(50), @Data varbinary(max) ) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[TEMPLATE] WHERE TEMPLATE_ID = @TemplateID) BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[TEMPLATE] SET [ORG_ID] = @OrgID ,[TYPE] = @Type ,[NAME] = @Name ,[UPLOAD_DATE] = @UploadDate ,[UPLOADED_BY] = @UploadedBy ,[DATA] = @Data WHERE TEMPLATE_ID = @TemplateID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[TEMPLATE] ([TEMPLATE_ID] ,[ORG_ID] ,[TYPE] ,[NAME] ,[UPLOAD_DATE] ,[UPLOADED_BY] ,[DATA]) VALUES (@TemplateID ,@OrgID ,@Type ,@Name ,@UploadDate ,@UploadedBy ,@Data) END
